sources.title: The Black Hand Gang
sources.description: Wee Georgie Wood leads his gang of ragamuffins through a series of comic vignettes, including disrupting a well-to-do children's party, fighting a rival gang and thwarting a robbery.

metadata.Plot: Wee Georgie Wood leads his gang of ragamuffins through a series of comic vignettes, including disrupting a well-to-do children's party, fighting a rival gang and thwarting a robbery.
metadata.Writer: Victor Kendall, Bert Lee, R.P. Weston
metadata.Actors: Wee Georgie Wood, Dolly Harmer, Violet Young
